description:
Misaki asks Mikan and Ann to become the action heroines of Hinano City! While they get acquainted with the other girls on the Heroine Team, another girl preps for her moment.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futsuu no "Roko" ga Heroine Yatte Mite mo Iindakedo
It`s Okay for a Normal "Roko" to Try to Become a Heroine
普通の【ろこ】がヒロインやってみてもいいんだけど
